trans-unit.source: Passed to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension.GenerateContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to enable the modification of a service contract and its context prior to generating code.
trans-unit.target: Passado para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension.GenerateContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName> método para habilitar a modificação de um contrato de serviço e seu contexto antes de gerar código.

trans-unit.source: Use the ServiceContractGenerationContext object passed to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension.GenerateContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to modify the code document object model prior to the generation of code.
trans-unit.target: Use o objeto ServiceContractGenerationContext passado para o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension.GenerateContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método de modificar o modelo de objeto de documento de código antes da geração de código.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension.GenerateContract%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=fullName> interface is implemented on a custom <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName> implementation that is used to import custom WSDL elements or otherwise modify the code at the service or operation level.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=fullName>interface é implementada em um personalizado <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName>implementação que é usada para importar elementos WSDL personalizados ou modificar o código no nível de serviço ou operação.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IWsdlImportExtension?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To modify the code at the operation level, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Para modificar o código no nível da operação, consulte <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IOperationContractGenerationExtension?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext"></xref> class using the specified contract generator, contract description, and contract code type declaration.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext"> </xref> classe usando o gerador de contrato especificado, a descrição do contrato e a declaração de tipo de código de contrato.

trans-unit.source: The generator that generates the code for the contract.
trans-unit.target: O gerador que gera o código para o contrato.

trans-unit.source: The contract description for the contract to be generated.
trans-unit.target: A descrição do contrato para o contrato a ser gerado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration"></xref> for the contract code to be generated.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration"> </xref> para o código de contrato a ser gerado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext"></xref> class using the specified contract generator, contract description, and contract code type declaration.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerationContext"> </xref> classe usando o gerador de contrato especificado, a descrição do contrato e a declaração de tipo de código de contrato.

trans-unit.source: The generator that generates the code for the contract.
trans-unit.target: O gerador que gera o código para o contrato.

trans-unit.source: The contract description for the contract to be generated.
trans-unit.target: A descrição do contrato para o contrato a ser gerado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration"></xref> for the contract code to be generated.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration"> </xref> para o código de contrato a ser gerado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration"></xref> for the duplex contract code to be generated.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration"> </xref> para o código de contrato duplex seja gerado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription?displayProperty=fullName> for the current contract.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription?displayProperty=fullName> para o contrato atual.

trans-unit.source: Use the Contract property to examine the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription?displayProperty=fullName> for the current contract.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade de contrato para examinar o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription?displayProperty=fullName>para o contrato atual.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription?displayProperty=fullName> for the current contract.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription?displayProperty=fullName> para o contrato atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration"></xref> for the current contract.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration"> </xref> para o contrato atual.

trans-unit.source: Use the ContractType property to examine or modify the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration?displayProperty=fullName> for the current contract before the code is generated.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade ContractType para examinar ou modificar o <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration?displayProperty=fullName>para o contrato atual antes do código é gerado.</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration"></xref> for the current contract.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration"> </xref> para o contrato atual.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration"></xref> for the duplex callback contract on the service contract.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration"> </xref> para o contrato de retorno de chamada dúplex no contrato de serviço.

trans-unit.source: Use the DuplexCallbackType property to examine or modify the <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration?displayProperty=fullName> for the duplex callback contract on the service contract prior to generating code.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade DuplexCallbackType para examinar ou modificar o <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration?displayProperty=fullName>para o contrato de retorno de chamada dúplex no contrato de serviço antes de gerar código.</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration"></xref> for the duplex callback contract on the service contract.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeDeclaration"> </xref> para o contrato de retorno de chamada dúplex no contrato de serviço.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext"></xref> objects that represent the contract operations.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext"> </xref> objetos que representam as operações de contrato.

trans-unit.source: Use the Operations property to examine or modify the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext?displayProperty=fullName> objects that represent the contract operations.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade de operações para examinar ou modificar o <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext?displayProperty=fullName>objetos que representam as operações de contrato.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext"></xref> objects that represent the contract operations.
trans-unit.target: Uma coleção de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationContractGenerationContext"> </xref> objetos que representam as operações de contrato.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator"></xref> that is to generate the contract.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator"> </xref> que é gerar o contrato.

trans-unit.source: Use the ServiceContractGenerator property to examine or modify the code generator that is to create the contract code.
trans-unit.target: Use a propriedade ServiceContractGenerator para examinar ou modificar o gerador de código é criar o código de contrato.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator"></xref> that is to generate the contract.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceContractGenerator"> </xref> que é gerar o contrato.
